snippet: A fresh accusation has surfaced that a witness paid a bribe while cooperating with prosecutors, leading two convicted political figures to push harder for a new trial.
abstract: Fresh accusation has surfaced that a Westchester County municipal employee paid businessmen Franco and Antonio Milio $5,000 cash bribe; action took place while men were cooperating with prosecutors as government witnesses in federal corruption investigation that led to conviction of former Councilwoman Sandy Annabi of Yonkers and her co-defendant; revelations have led pair to seek new trials.
lead_paragraph: A fresh accusation has surfaced that a witness paid a bribe while cooperating with prosecutors, leading two convicted political figures to push harder for a new trial.

headline.main: New Issue of Corruption for Witness in Yonkers
headline.print_headline: New Issue Of Corruption For Witness in Yonkers
